Case Study (FSD)
Case Study (FSD)

Monroe Middle School has a satellite
Monroe Middle School has a satellite

kitchen with cooking facilities. It receives tuna casseroles cold from a central kitchen. The cook follows the instructions in the recipe: “Cook 45 minutes at 350oF.” When the cook receives the casseroles, she puts them in a preheated oven. What is wrong with this? What are your suggestions?
